description.value:
The dragon sends out a wave of heat that inflames emotions with 90 feet. Creatures within it must attempt a @Check[will] save with a DC equal to the dragon's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.Frightful Presence] DC. Regardless of the results, they are then immune to Inflame Emotions for 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature can spend a reaction to make a melee Strike against a target of its choice.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature immediately makes a melee Strike against a target of the dragon's choice. The creature cannot use reactions until the start of its next turn.
